knowledge.question: When is a Sprint Backlog item considered complete?
choices: When all of its tasks are complete
When everything is done based on the definition of "Done"
When the user acceptance tests are done
explanation: When the item is complete based on the definition of "Done", the end users can use it and it creates an Increment of working software which is potentially releasable. Note: if all the tasks for an item are complete, it doesn't necessarily mean that the item is complete because we might have forgotten to add some of the tasks.
